metadata.dc:author: Queizán de la Fuente, A
López Vázquez, F
Cuadros García, J
metadata.dc:description: Four cases of congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation of the lung are described. One was a stillborn, and the other three newborns, all of them surviving after lobectomy. Pathological, clinical and radiological features are discussed and compared with previously reported cases.
metadata.dc:title: Adenomatosis quística pulmonar congénita. Estudio de cuatro casos.
[Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation of the lung (author's transl)].
